data.quote: You have the right to work, but never to the fruit of work.
data.author: Bhagvad Gita

data.quote: Greatness is not guarding yourself from the people; greatness is being accepted by the people.
data.author: Mike Tyson

data.quote: Peace begins with a smile.
data.author: Mother Teresa

data.quote: Turn your face to the sun and the shadows fall behind you.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: We shall never know all the good that a simple smile can do.
data.author: Mother Teresa

data.quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, 'Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.
data.author: Muhammad Ali

data.quote: Life is tough, but it's tougher if you're stupid.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Always be yourself, express yourself, have faith in yourself, do not go out and look for a successful personality and duplicate it.
data.author: Bruce Lee

data.quote: Knowledge will give you power, but character respect.
data.author: Bruce Lee

data.quote: If you lose a big fight, it will worry you all of your life. It will plague you - until you get your revenge.
data.author: Muhammad Ali

data.quote: Friendship... is not something you learn in school. But if you haven't learned the meaning of friendship, you really haven't learned anything.
data.author: Muhammad Ali

data.quote: Death is just life's next big adventure.
data.author: J. K. Rowling

data.quote: If you want to shine like a sun, first burn like a sun.
data.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Peace begins with a smile.
data.author: Mother Teresa

data.quote: When I fight someone, I want to break his will. I want to take his manhood. I want to rip out his heart and show it to him.
data.author: Mike Tyson

data.quote: The biggest risk is not taking any risk... In a world that changing really quickly, the only strategy that is guaranteed to fail is not taking risks.
data.author: Mark Zuckerberg

data.quote: Genius is patience.
data.author: Isaac Newton

data.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
data.author: Henry Ford

data.quote: Whatever happened, happened for the good. Whatever is happening, is happening for the good. Whatever will happen, will also happen for the good.
data.author: Bhagvad Gita
